Text:
Just downloaded this. It comes with two files:
- crude.nfo
- DLC_Quest_1.1.4439.32928_Setup

I scanned the files with Microsoft Security Essentials and Malwarebytes Anti-Malware and got no virus / threats.

After installing, the game ran perfectly. TLDR; It works. +1
Thanks so much for this! :D Works without any flaws, and has no viruses.
